update_plan.update_summary: The configuration update requires updating the project documentation, specifically in README.md, master_blueprint.md, and current_status.json. The changes include an increase in total examples, updates to various categories, and potential impacts on model performance and overall functionality.
key_changes: Potential impact on model performance and project functionality

specific_updates.README.md: Update the section explaining configuration changes with details about the latest modifications.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Revise the configuration sections to reflect the latest changes.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Update the configuration-related fields and describe any potential impacts on system components.
